verses.name: Genesis 2:8
verses.text: And the Lord God planted a garden eastward in Eden; and there he put the man whom he had formed.

verses.name: Genesis 2:9
verses.text: And out of the ground made the Lord God to grow every tree that is pleasant to the sight and good for food; the tree of life also in the midst of the garden, and the tree of knowledge of good and evil.

verses.name: Genesis 2:10
verses.text: And a river went out of Eden to water the garden; and from thence it was parted, and became into four heads.
